verses.roman:
ye nayana dekhite aśru haya mane yāra
sei netre avicchinna vahe aśru-dhāra

synonyms: ye—his; nayana—eyes; dekhite—seeing; aśru—tears; haya—appear; mane—from the mind; yāra—of someone; sei netre—in his eyes; avicchinna—continuously; vahe—flows; aśru-dhāra—a shower of tears.
translation: When someone saw the eyes of Mīnaketana Rāmadāsa, tears would automatically flow from his own eyes, for a constant shower of tears flowed from the eyes of Mīnaketana Rāmadāsa.
